content.detailedDescription: I was letting dog out seen this bright star and thought i would see it thru binoculars when i looked at it with them it was a ball of energy flashing like a tesla electric ball stayed in one place for long time when i came back out was gone have not seen it since what did i see has anyone else seen this . looks like a star unless you use binoculars.I feel like i seen something but what looked transparent but electric pulsating lines inside. i thought it was just a star but it is something else. i feel like since i am near an air force base maybe it was there's do you know? i am freaking out it had no sound , and if i hadn't got the binoculars would not have seen it.
content.summary: Was a ball of energy with flashing lights like a tesla ball inside pink blue

content.detailedDescription:
I sat with a friend on a swinging bench in his backyard in harbor springs, michigan. we were both looking at sky, and without talking with each other we watched this white light come out of now where in the sky, faster than anything i have ever seen, it swooped in a straight line out of darkness and stopped, almost if it was looking at us. i remember distantly looking at my watch right before @ 2:05 am and once we observed the ufo leave orbit. it was 4:30am and my friends mother open the window to the house to yell at us for being so pound. so it from the fastest thing i have ever seen, to a dead stop, then lost over 2 hours, and accelerated as fast as it stopped and left. we both looked at each other after his mother yelled at us through the window, looking at each other and talking over what we had just seen, and questioning the fact of the lost time. while we are now both believers we rarely tell people about what we saw because, we already learned that the story doesn't earn any credit, and we get shunned for believing. but we also dont speak much about it becuase we dont know what happened. why did we loose time, as far as we know we were silent the entire time before his mother opened her bedroom window to yell at us. since that day, i have been unable to think the same way, do the same things, an my previous medical problems seemed to worsen. 

i have seen very similar sightings more and more and choose to kepp quiet, as to not be outcasted but as crazy as it sounds,  i feel like they come every so often, and make their presence known. its starting to worry me, as if they are keeping tabs on me
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A friend and i were sitting on bench saw the sighting, came into atmosphere stopped hovered, and left. lost 2 hours of time!

content.detailedDescription:
On
 oct. 1 2013 at 11:28 pm i was walking my dog outside when i noticed an 
unusual cluster of stars high in the sky. what initially caught my 
attention was the fact that there seemed to be a large number of stars 
within a very small area and had never seen a cluster of stars like 
that. after approximately 5 to 10 seconds of staring at the stars i 
noticed they started becoming more clear and defined in what was already
 a very clear starry night. at first the stars seemed to move together 
very slowly. my first thought was i was seen an illusion from 
temperature changes in the night air or some other explainable cause. 
within a second or two the cluster either became brighter and larger or 
closer as it was hard to tell in the dark sky and began to accelerate in
 a north by northeast direction. the entire time the stars maintained an
 exact position with relation to each other and moved as if they were part of the same solid object. within 20 seconds the cluster had moved completely out of sight. i stood there trying to understand how stars could have appeared to move that way and continued scanning the sky to find some rational explanation. just then i looked up and over the roof on the apartment building next to mine and i noticed a small translucent circle or sphere moving at a speed slightly faster than walking coming from a southwest direction just above the tree line and heading straight for the other apartment building. as it approached the roof it had to increase its 
altitude by a few feet so as not to hit the roof. once it was above the 
roof it changed to a straight north direction and continued on directly 
above my head, then seemed to drop by a foot or two.  when it was within a few feet of the apartment building next door it became close enough to illuminate the side.  it rose a few feet, cleared the building, and slowly accelerated away in a northerly direction.  the entire time i was looking for wings on the object like a bird or bat or some other explanation that could cause something like that to appear.

it wasn't until an hour or two later when it really hit me.  my wife noticed something was not right with me.  i began to have a wave of what felt like extreme sadness, anger, and loss of control that left me wishing the entire incident never happened.
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Unknown
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Unusual star cluster began to move,formed v shape, followed by small ball over home

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
my girlfriend and i left the condo at 10:10 to walk the dog on the highline canal trail behind the building. we proceeded west, it was cold and overcast with those sorts of clouds that appear misty that come in winter, very grey and heavy looking. we were about 10 minutes in the walk, actively looking for strange lights, etc. as 4 nights previously i had seen another orange orb to the south of the trail in the boundaries of a golfcourse. my girlfriend spotted an owl in the trees which i then photographed. we proceeded west again down the trail when i looked up and spotted a shooting star, and got a bit excited as things seemed to be getting interesting. not 5 minutes later to the south we beheld another orange orb, very distinctly yellow orange about 50 feet above what i believe would be the lakes surface within the golfcourse, it was very bright, brighter than the moon (not larger)and very intense. we watched it intently to be sure it was not anything we could discern. it rose about 50 feet in this time and then vanished, seeming to implode.
we proceeded southward again toward fairmount cemetery, being just south of it, or behind the the cemetery on the highline canal trail, looking even more curiously around  in anticipation of something... when we spotted a little white light south- westerly about 70 degrees from horizon and about 1500 feet right at cloud level set between two very grey and heavy clouds. we watched it, quickly dismissing it as a probable airplane, when it then just disappeared, it did not move forward into clouds, it appeared, and disappeared. we were now freaking out, not uncontrollably but rather in a happy excited way. 
we stayed in that spot, looking all over for anything when about 10 miles northeast seeming to be out by dia we spotted another orange orb, one could tell this one was quite large due to the distance, and its size. if not for its bright orange color we would not have watched it as intently, it moved from left to right, then stopped and stayed in place, again vanishing in an implosion looking manner. i was trying to photograph them, but was having camera difficulties.
content.summary: 2 orange orbs, and 1 white star like ufo.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in my kitchen lase night watching television. a bright red-orange light caught my eye out the window. it was traveling south to north, toward me. then it turned and started moving east. suddenly another one appeared taking the same course. the second one caught up to the first and they traveled closely together. i thought the color was strange, and noticed they weren't blinking like planes. also, this is a regular flight path to newburgh airport, but those planes are always traveling north to south and east to south, so this was really out of the ordinary. i ran upstairs to alert my husband to this, so that he could witness it as well. he is an amateur astronomer, and i thought "if i tell him this , and he doesn't see it, he's going to say 'oh it was venus'." so, i made sure he saw it and even he said it was highly unusual. then we saw the third one appear from the same direction as the other two, but it stayed behind them, not catching up. finally they were almost as far away to the east as we could see from that window when they disappeared, the pair in front first, then the one in the rear.

my husband said,"i think they disappeared like that because they were in the earth's shadow. you know there are planes and things up that high...It could have been satellites. the color could have been a sun event because they were so high." i've seen satellites, and they're white and move fast.These moved slowly and were a weird red color. and they weren't planes because they didn't blink they were like...Wobbly"

anyhow, today when i asked him what he thought about it he said, "swamp-gas, weather balloon"and when i told him i was going to write about it to mufon he said "don't put my name on it."
content.summary: Three bright red-orange objects observed through south facing window.

content.detailedDescription:
While traveling west on u.S. 74 from shelby towards boiling springs, nc. i was riding as a passenger, in the back seat, on the drivers side, i was looking across the freshly cut cotton fields for deer when i noticed a very large, silver/chrome colored orb hovering above the field. i had been watching the sky this morning due to the many con-trails being left by the high flying aircraft in the area.  this was very different than the many aircraft i had seen, it was much larger, and closer than the high flying aircraft that were in the area. it had no wings or lights that i could tell.  it was a very shiny, chrome-like orb, and much larger than any other object in the otherwise clear sky.

i pointed it out to my brother that was in the front passengers seat.  he also saw the object and could not figure out what it was either.  after about 30 seconds the tree line partially blocked our view so i asked my dad to make the next left turn onto beaver dam church road heading south directly towards the area the orb was observed.  when we cleared the trees, less than a minute later, there was nothing at all in the otherwise clear sky.
content.summary: Hovering silver reflective orb

content.detailedDescription:
I placed a infrared trail camera in my woods on my back land line about 3 weeks ago. camera was set to take a 10 second video ever 10 minutes. a 2gb sd card was changed out on the afternoon of november 19, 2013. this card stayed in the camera until the afternoon of november 22, 2013. 
when i viewed the videos on the night of november 22, 2013 i found that two of the night videos, one at 01:45am and the second one at 01:55am, on the morning of november 22, 2013 contained the following: 1. a raccoon feeding on some corn. 2. a white ball suspended in the air above the raccoon which moved, shook, and dropped down toward the raccoon. the second video ten minutes  later at 01:55am shows the raccoon backed up looking at the white ball and then deciding it was time to leave. the white ball was dancing around going back and forth, up and down, goes off camera and comes back and video ends. in the second video the white ball seems to be smaller than it is in the first video. 
there were no white balls of light in any of the other videos before these two nor was there any in the videos following these two. these two videos would have covered a time span of thirty minutes twenty seconds. ten minutes before the video started, ten seconds during the first video, ten minutes between the first and second video, ten seconds during the second video, and then ten minutes after the second video. 
i dont have any idea if this qualifies as a ufo, or not, but it is above the ground about six feet and moving around like a ball dancing in the wind. the only eye witness is the raccoon and i dont know where it can be located. if it had not been for this moving white ball i would have deleted these two videos. however, because of it i have placed them in a folder to keep.
had to use september for month account it would not take the actual month of november when i tried to submit.
content.summary: Round white ball above feeding raccoon on video of trail camera.

content.detailedDescription: The dates are approximate.  its been almost forty years but i cant stop thinking about it..The best i can do is 1976 to 1978. the location was demolished in 1985 to facilitate the i15/91fwy interchange the object was basically hovering over the old krel radio building south of my house. i was playing with my dogs.  i looked up to the south,i don't remember why.  i observed a solid object brownish in color.  the object looked like a designer blimp. it made a humming sound like a blimp. it was long possibly cigar shaped with an appendage that looked like a paddle wheel partially covered by a cowling.  i remember thinking it looked like a riverboat just hovering about two hundred feet above the ground. i ran back to the house about one thousand feet.  when i looked back it was gone.  i remember an initial fright but dismissed the whole thing quite quickly.  i cant swear to it but i recall losing some time.  i cant tell you what i got for x-mas that year but this incident remains..Ive often thought of being hypnotized to see if could recall exactly what happened. i have skimmed through the internet but cant find another sighting of a similar object.
content.summary: I was out playing with my dogs.  i  looked up to the south and observed a craft

content.detailedDescription: i was 11yrs old i felt strange and went out side. the night was clear and calm. i looked up and saw them 3 triangle shape objects. they just stayed in one place.I looked at my watch it was 9 pm. i must have watched them for 20 min. i then went inside and called careswell afb. they said it was a hoax. two myaterias showed up at the door about 10:15 pm that night. thst scared me to death. i kept quite till now.
content.summary: 3 triangle craft at a hover no sound i called carswell a f b

content.detailedDescription: I was at work doing a night shift as im in the security buisness, i was out doing my rounds on a patrol, i hered some un usual noises coming from trees and bushes i went over to check it out where i thought it was teenagers messing about. there was some flashy lights going on and off in mid air which freaked me out a little, it was an object that appeared then dissapeared then re appeared like it was invisible, hard to describe really. i tried touching the object but it was like touching fin air so i couldnt touch nothing. the object was in a shape of a disc and there was a glowing patern on the object, i reckonised the pattern from somewhere before then after the event happened it occured to me the pattern was the orions belt. i just knew this object was not from our planet, i didnt see any alien type people, i was hearing unusual noises like a type of language where i assume something was trying to communicate with me. i see something fuzzy images on this object it looked like frequency from somewhere ure see on are tvs, they looked like pre recordings of images of nuclear bombs going off, then go to another images of armys going to war with countrys, nuclear power stations, forests burning, images of cars in busy citys. happened for about 30 seconds. this event affected my mobile phone/cell phone. this object didnt seem to have landed on ground surface because of the way it took off in a blink of an eye and gave off a great burst of heat. i think this event was trying to tell me something i dont know, maybe a warning i dont know. but after this experiance i now know in my head we are not alone. and the goverment should stop trying to hide stuff like this. the people have a right to know this is our planet our home. they can try and hide stuff, but people like us/public we see it all aswell. our planet is a big place. i thought i should share my experiance on this site because i dont know who to tell.
content.summary: Harmless event

content.detailedDescription:
1. in bedroom lying on the bed looking up out of window bay.

2. flashing coloured lights and disc shape.

3. saucer/disc shape craft.

4. flashing coloured lights that flashed around the front/bottom of the object. saucer shape with a dome on top. hovered above house for a minute or two and then was gone. no direction, just vanished.

5. at first disbelief so i called in my brother to see if i was seeing things. he saw it and confirmed it was there also. so we just watched in disbelief. what i found strange being the ufo was hovering above our house in broad daylight in a city was that, no one else saw it. so we just thought it was our imaginations and never spoke of it again until now. 

6. keep asking myself that question, don't remember apart from it just vanished.
content.summary: Hovering disc shape

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
On saturday november 13th around 6:58pm eastern standard time. i was on the way home from a local mall with my son and my nephew. i notice something out of the corner of my eye that was glowing bright orange and this caught my attention immediately and pulled over my car and investigated further. the glowing orb begin to drop several white looking balls of light out of it toward the ground. i knew this was not a plane so i took out my cell phone and started taking pictures. i also made a 11 second video. there where two objects that showed up on the video. the one object hovered on the horizon and as a commerical airplane approached in the same direction as the object the lights dimmed down and there was a flash of light and it was gone. i came home and reviewed the pictures i had taken only to be shocked by what showed up on film and video. there where multiple objects on film and they appeared in diffenrent shapes,colors, and sizes. i also have pictures that appears to show the face of something standing in the wooded area in front of us? it was not a refection as there was nothing but woods in front of us? the video i record showed 2 orange orbs one moving and zig zaggin off my screen. i don't know what it was that i saw? but i would like for someone with better equipment to view my video and photos and let me know their thoughts? i have more pictures to submit. also last night november 23 i took some more pictures of a different object in the same area of a. more to come as i will be uploading those pictures and new video as well.  

thanks
content.summary: On saturday november 16, i saw something that caught my eye glowing orange in the sky. the is orange object was dropping several white balls of light out of it toward the ground. the object flashed and then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: #1. i was going and coming from work: on the way towards the foothills village of robb alberta being a hobby photographer i felt 'drawn' to take some pictures of the beautiful sky. i stopped at a well site road and took a couple of shots. when i arrived at my work site i reviewed the pictures i took. i became very excited and apprehensive, then decided to leave the work-site (optional workday)to return and take more pictures. i scanned the sky for metallic bird-size shapes but all i could find of interest were clouds. i noticed a particularly strangely complicated cloud and thought i will have to have a closer look at those pictures on the computer. the cloud may have been moving slowly cloud-like or it may have been hovering for some reason i didn't think much more about documenting size, distance, with my outstretched fist but guess it would have been about basket ball size at arm outstretched. i have a feeling there were many more of these shapes traveling under that grey ceiling cloud. i get the feeling there is more to come, i should be there.
content.summary: Beautiful sky, was 'drawn' to snap some shots of the sky, i did notice this cloud and think i must enhance this but then i took other shots and didn't check back on this cloud.

content.detailedDescription:
We had just got back home from birmingham, as we got out the car i looked up as i felt drawn to something. there isnt much light pollution at the back of our house and me and my fiancee both witnessed 6-7 disk shaped / circular objects flying directly above us in a north east direction, there was a very very slight hum other than that the objects were silent i watched 1 moving side to side whilst travelling forward and another moved up and down, the movement of these craft were nothing ive seen before on our 'military' planes, i have seen 'military' jets travelling above our home in a westerly direction, which was about 2 weeks before this. directly after the craft sighting on 22/11/2013 we saw what seemed to be a passenger plane flying in a different direction at a similiar altitude, these objects were 2-3 times the size and travelled at a ridiculoud speed! we have seen various sightings over cannock chase over the last few years but this was the most clear cut!
this is the first time ive seen a ufo and felt worried, i felt their movements were of an aggressive nature.... coincidentally they were flying towards cannock chase
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: We got out of the car looked up and saw the lights directly above us

content.detailedDescription: Siting out side the back of my home. with family an friends. i like to look up at the stars. i notice what i thought was a shooting star go across the sky then suddenly shoot straight up into the sky. thinking it was a shooting star i felt excited. i see them all the time but when it went straight up kinda made me a little scared. me of my friends also noticed it.
content.summary: Ufo shoot across then straight up

content.detailedDescription:
It was like a star-like object  going straight , i went to my room to get my ipad to film it and i couldnt find it again it disaappearedand when i saw it moving it was about 30 miles per hour..

1- i was at my room looking at the stars in the sky
2- i suddenly saw a star like object moving
3-a star
4-it looked like a star , it was moving around 30 miles per hour in a straight line

5-6- holy s**t  no way could that be a ufo , i was excited i saw it for about 10 seconds then went into the room to get my ipad to film it and then i lost it
content.summary: It was like a star-like object  going straight , i went to my room to get my ipad to film it and i couldnt find it again it disaappearedand when i saw it moving it was about 30 miles per hour..

content.detailedDescription: On patio. star watching. a star.Never seen anything like it before.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Star like object.Made 3 circular movements the stopped for a opulent of seconds then shot towards ground

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was driving down the lane to my house, it was around 5.15pm and dark, with some cloud coverage.  as i turned the corner on the lane i noticed a beam of light shining down from the clouds which appeared to be over my house or the bottom of my garden/field. at first i thought wow the moon is shinning a beam over my house, as i got closed within a few seconds i keep staring and the beam seemed too intense and straight, then suddenly the beam switched off (like a torch) and a egg/balloon shape lit up, which made the clouds around it become brighter, it looked slightly transparent and was half in the clouds and half out,  then suddenly it shot up vertically as such speed.  when i arrived at my house (about 30 seconds to a minute) i let my dog out and he started barking for a few seconds. during my short car journey and as i was looking at the object i tried to rationalise what this could be but i know what i saw.
content.summary: Direct beam, this abruptly switched off then the egg like shape brightened and shot up vertically as great speed.

content.detailedDescription: ���returning from nite out..Garaged car and paused as usual in the drive to sight stars and orion..I thought a beam shone,a pulse,from sw above.I turned to sw looking up and was shocked by a large,vague dark moving thing.Am i seeing this?Whats that?Yes,i do see,and as it's flying nw i see clearer���it's a giant wing.Very large and high as aircraft,but larger than commercial jets���a distinct dark,but bronze color.With many small yellow lights.Near directly overhead.And then i see another one coming from behind on near same path as first���they each sailed nw���each with occasional wing rocking..A gentle motion tho���and soon they both were lost to sight���traveling same speed,altitude..Into the dark���.There was no sound..Nor any other sort of disturbance..Ground ,or air���except,of course..In me���i was quite impressed..And lingered to sort out what i'd just seen?..Still watching the night sky..I was in awe!!���finally i went indoors..And called my brother to relate it as happened���tho,disappointingly,he suggested c-47's���?���certainly not,i thought���nor like anything i've ever,ever seen before"...
content.summary: Looking at orion.Looked sw and detected movement.Something very high and big,silent,hard to see till overhead.Flew nw and followed by another!!Each had slight rocking motion.Many small yellow lights on bronze skin...

content.detailedDescription:
I was 15 in 1958, and had absolutely no exposure to ufo stories.  object was sighted at great height, above a spotted lower layer of small clouds, image was very clear and distinct.    i was working in a farm building, and initially noticed object while walking outside for a brief break from tedious work.    checked again, perhaps four times over an hour or so, object still visible and very much stationary.    was later distracted by work, and forgot the sightings, so did not see any change or movement.

object was clearly a very long cylinder, milky white, with perfectly hemispherical ends, oriented approximately e-w, but no other discernible features.   my estimate is that this object was at least 100 feet in diameter, and 1200 feet long, or possibly much larger, as there was no other object useable as a reference.

many years later, was astonished to read a ufo book on historical recorded sightings, and this identical object was reported as the most common sighted object, over 3000 being recorded as at printing of the book.

with zero knowledge of ufo sightings, i was totally mystified for many years, until reading the referenced book.

have since read allen hynek and many other authors.

even as a young [ uninitiated ] high school student, and later a degreed civil engineer, my absolute conviction was and is that this very large object was a machine, capable of indefinite hovering at great height, with a total absence of features other than its very distinct and clear external shape and milky white colour.

as my knowledge of ufo sightings increased, i have long had absolutely no doubt that such phenomena are real and common, and am hostile to any authority actively keeping knowledge from the people who pay all the bills  -  the public.
content.summary: Stationary dull white cylinder with distinct hemispherical ends, at great height, seen multiple times

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend and i pulled into our driveway and got out of the car. my boyfriend noticed this very bright starlike object in the sky and asked me to look at it. we stood there and looked at it for 20 minutes and it did not move. we went inside and looked up what planets are visible tonight and found venus to be prominent in the sw tonight. we showed our roommate the starlike objects and watched it for another 10 minutes and then went inside. i checked on the starlike thing every 10 minutes for 2 hours and then it simply was not there after a while.
content.summary: Very bright light in the sw (first thought to be venus)

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking my dogs outside. we were out there fot about 10 min. after about 5 mins i went to sit down in my chair & i happened to look toward my neighbor's house and just about 3 houses down above the treeline wete these bright lights. brighter than any spotlights i've ever seen moving in a circular rotation type pattern. there was no sound what so ever. this object looked like it was heading toward the longview airport/ kilgore, tx area. i live only a few miles from the longview airport so i see & hear airplanes & helicopters. this object was neither of these. after about a minute the object went out of my sight. i sat there thinking oh my god what did i just see. i got up & went into the yard trying to see if i could see this object again, but sadly i couldnt see it anymore. i still can not wrap my brain around what i saw. i tried finding this object again but then i was scared that if it would come back i didnt want to be out in the open. just in case it could abduct anyone. after about 5 mins more my dogs & i came inside & still oinda in shock i called my aunt to ask her to go outside to see if she can see anything. since the object was kind of headed her direction. she wasn't able to see anything. after talking to her i got in touch with [name removed/cms/tg]. through facebook & he gave me the link to this page. if you need anymore info or if you find out anymore info please let me know.
thank you,
[name removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: Object flew above the treeline toward airport of longview, tx

content.detailedDescription: Same as above except we stayed in the same place for about 10 more minutes after it disappeared waiting for it to reappear but it did not.  so we drove down the colonial parkway to see if we could see it from there & we could not. we were on our way home from having dinner in williamsburg, va. when we saw the light. we have no idea what it was. we have lived in our home for 17 years & have never seen anything quite like it before. t was very bright. we had not been drinking. we are in our 50's. this is our first sighting report. i definately felt we were experiencing something unusual and perhaps extraterrestrial. it wasn't right. something was "off" about it.  my husband is an engineer.  he was determined to prove to me that it was just a very, very, bright star that was really low & went behind the clouds. so he drove up and down the colonial parkway in his attempt to find the star.  we never saw it again.
content.summary: My husband & i witnessed an extremely bright star-like light hovering in night sky over surry county.  it was much lower than a cloud & did not move.  it was not a plane.  heavy clould cover drifted by aftter about 15 minutes of watching it & it was gone.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my back porch, which looks out to a huge field. it was 8:00 pm and very dark. i say a spherical object hovering 4-5 feet above the ground. the sphere was glowing extremely brightly, and i could not see any features. the color of the light was a white/yellow. there was a second sphere that was red and very slowly hovered in random flight patterns around the big sphere while it was about 2 feet away from the big sphere, but not touching it. the small red sphere was about 17 inches in diameter while the big sphere was 2 feet in diameter. my lights flickered on and off once and very fast. then, my tv turned off and had an unusual amount of static emitting from it because it shocked me. it was there for about a half hour, when it became too cold and i was forced to come inside. i remember hearing an extremely faint whirring sound. (same as a computer makes when it is running). it was strange how a big shining sphere had a small red sphere orbiting around it.
content.summary: Big sphere with small sphere orbiting around the big sphere. shined very brightly.

content.detailedDescription: I was 13 years old and with several cousins and friends. we were playing hide and seek at my aunt dot`s house just down the street from where i lived. we had been playing from the time it got dark outside. so i`m guessing about the time it happened but maybe between 8pm and 9pm. it could have been later but we were always in the house by 10pm. anyhow i decided to hide in a field that was grown up with weeds, that was right behind my aunts house. i walked into the field maybe 30 to 50 feet and laid down in the soft weeds on my back so no one could see me. i could hear the other kids talking but not very good. as i lay there i noticed a object way off in the distance. it was very small. if i had held out my hand to measure it, it would have been about the size of my pinky nail. as i watching it suddenly came to stop directly over me in a split second. it moved so quick that i did`t see it actually move from where it was to where it stopped. i laid there looking at it and remember like it just happened today. i did`t feel afraid at all but just felt mesmerized by what it was doing. i know it was only about 300ft above me because it was so easy to see. it was round looking at it from the bottom but i know it was saucer shaped from what i saw when it left but i`ll get to that in a moment.It did not make any sound at all. it was mostly metllic in color and had several lights that were in rings " one inside the other" there were 5 rings and each ring had maybe 20 to 30 lightshapes in it that were changing color, size and shape as they moved around the ring. the lightshapes within each ring was moving in a different direction than the other rings.Each lightshape was not a clear square or triangle or oval or other shape. each lightshape was dark in color and did not light up the ground where i was. i remember thinking it was beautiful. it only stayed there like that for around 30 to 45 seconds or perhaps a minute. then suddenly as it came, it left. i remember it leaving just a short blurr of itself going in the direction it came from but could not see it disappear into the distance. within the blurr i saw a side view of a saucer shape. the blurr it left was about 100 to 300ft long.I ask the other kids if they saw it but no one did. i could not believe they did`t see it. if one of them did then they never admitted it. this was my first sighting of three in my life. i have been telling others about it my whole life. my next 2 sightings there were witnesses but that`s another memory.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: It came from a far distance and hovered then left in the same direction it came from.

content.detailedDescription: Walked outside, noticed bright stationary object south of my position. maybe a mile away, very bright and big. too low to be a star. was not an airplane. late dusk, very prominent.Still there at the moment, has not moved within half hour.
content.summary: Bright object stationary in sky, very bright. not moving, too low to be star. bright

content.detailedDescription: I just pulled into the drive way of my house, i got out of the car and looked up at one of the brightest stars in the night sky in the west, i glanced over and there it was, moving really slow, i saw a glare of light bounce off of it. seems to be in a v shape, moving in one direction, i walked closer to get a better look and within 20 seconds it seemed to disappear and i did not see anything else except a few flickering lights from the airplanes in all different directions. i thought to myself that i did not look like a bird, it just grabbed my attention so fast. there was no noise it was a quiet night in the neighborhood. i still do not know what it is.
content.summary: Dark sky, did not look like flock of geese. moved slow. disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I had just moved to wa state,and had never experianced the ocean.  my friends mom invited me on a boat trip from anacortes,wa,to everett,wa on a boat.  i jumped at the chance to fish and boat in the puget sound.  we travelled south to everett,moored and slept on the first night. we walked around the port for the day,observing the aircraft carrier that was moored at the port as well.  around five we began moving north towards home.  i looked towards everett 45 minutes later and observed three to four bright orbs above the city.  i yelled at everyone to look.  then there where five,then eight,then three,then five.  this continued for ten minutes.  then there was six,then three, then one.  they always appeared in different positions.  ive seen video on youtube of the same exact thing.  i know that there is something else observing us.  im 33 now,i was 17 at the time of the event. thank you for reading this and i hope i wasnt the only one that day.
content.summary: Looked south at dusk orbs

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
Driving on a dirt dark unlit road...Noticed to my nw what i thought was a quick meteor flash of yellow and it lasted a few seconds and was gone. 
shortly after, it reappeared further on a straight path without any cloud cover in the sky that night. i watched while driving and it disappeared again and did not see it for another few minutes while driving. it then reappeared about 5 minutes later on my ne side further past a tree line, but noticeable and as i watched it changed from one yellow light to two yellow lights in a row and then very quickly became 4 yellow lights and then it was gone.
content.summary: Yellow light - looked like a meteor without a tail at first glance

content.detailedDescription: Hello, today i took a selfie outside a gas station in north port,  fl.  i didn't look at the pictures until later that night. to my surprise a strange alien figure is in the background.  i am not a believer of aliens but this figure really impacted me.  i am 98% no one was around me at the time.
content.summary: Alien figure in the background of a photo
